bio:
Crecius Rodlin is a priest of Talos at the secluded Camp of the Devout in the far eastern wilderness of County Bruma in Cyrodiil. The remote camp is home to a small community of Talos worshipers, led by a woman named Aera the Devout. They spend much of their time nervously checking to make sure that the Thalmor haven't located their hideout. Spread around a central campfire is a shrine to Talos and multiple tents.
Crecius is an Imperial. He usually wears hooded brown robes. As well as being armed with an iron mace, Crecius knows spells such as Healing, Lesser Ward and Oakflesh. 
Examples of Crecius' dialogue towards passing travelers: 
"I'm Crecius Rodlin, sworn to Talos." 
"Aera leads the congregation. I'm just a humble servant, a simple devotee." 
If asked about himself "I'd prefer not to say too much. Got to walk on eggshells nowadays. That said... I used to live in Bruma. Narrowly evaded abduction - heard Armion and his agents whispering outside my window. Aera and I, we... we escaped in the night, through the Bruma Caverns. Botram let us use his house as a quick escape route. Good thing the guard captain didn't know about the trap door in Botram's house, or I'm sure Armion would've, too. Those were dark days. Dark days. Having to worship Tiber Septim in secret. Pfft! Those Aldmeri dogs'll get what's coming to them eventually."
name: Crecius Rodlin
